titleStmt.title: European peace treaties of the pre-modern era in data / Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne in Daten (FriVer+)
Vertrag von Tokaj (Hauptvertrag und Zollkonvention)

editionStmt.edition: Digital edition according to TEI P5

editor.note: The transformation and enrichment of the data is done by Jaap Geraerts (IEG Mainz). The other members of the FriVer+ team are Fabian Cremer, Ines Grund, and Thorsten Wübbena (all IEG Mainz).

The original data has been created by the team of scholars who were part of the Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne project. This project was lead by Prof. Dr. Heinz Duchhardt and was based at the Leibniz Institute of European History in Mainz.

licence.p: This file is licensed under the terms of the Creative Commons License CC-BY 4.0 (Attribution 4.0 International)

msDesc.p: MolBudapest: 1. Hauptvertrag [ohne Nachweis] 2. Zollkonvention: Acta publica E 142 Fasz. 45 Nr. 11: Tokaj, 1627 V 19 (Abschrift).

projectDesc.p: The data in this XML file, originally created by the project Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne online has been transformed in accordance with TEI P5 as part of the project Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne in Daten (FriVer+)

div.p: Roderich Gooss, Österreichische Staatsverträge. Fürstentum Siebenbürgen. Wien 1911, S.633-637. Monumenta comitiali regni Transsilvaniae VIII, S.418-423.

Regelungen nach dem Preßburger Frieden für die sieben Komitate. Zollfragen. Warenverkehr.
Zollkonvention

Actorum Publico[rum] Fasz. 45 nr.12
<Nos Jo>Verdeckt.annes Piber, Electus Episcopus Agrien[sis] Præpositus Major Eccl[esiæ]Metro-
<politanæ>Verdeckt. Strigonien[sis] Comesque <…>Hevessien[sis], item Stephanus ostrosit de Gile<nitz>
<Sacræ>Verdeckt. Cæsar[eæ] et Regiæ Ma[jesta]tis Consiliarÿ, ac Georgius Hoffman, prælibat<æ>
Suæ Ma[jesta]tis Cameræ Hungaircæ Consiliarius, Proventum Regio[rum] in superior[rum]
Hungaria Administrator. Ex parte Suæ Ma[jesta]tis Nec non Sigismundus
Lonÿai de Nagÿ, Supremus Comes Comitatus Kraznensis, Joannes
Bornemiza de Zendrö. Vice-Generalis Cassoviensis, Stephanus Cassÿ
Prothonotarius per Tran[silva]niam, Serenissimi Sacri Romani Imperÿ et Trans[ilvan]iæ
Principis, Consiliarÿ David Belavarÿ, Cameræ Cassovien[sis] et Bonorum <…>
Cis-Tibiscanorum Præfectus ex parte Sui Serenitatis delegate Commisarÿ etc.
Memoriæ commendamus tenore præsentium significantes duibus expedit
universis. Quod Nos Virtute plenipotentiæ nobis attributæ, et vigore
Articuli quinti Diplomatis novissimæ Pacificationis Posonien[sis] in nego-
cio Tricesimarum, ratione futuræ Exactionis, de ÿs rebus, quæ
ex Septem Comitatibus, per Suam Sacra[m] Cæs[aream] et Regiam M[ajesta]tem Suæ Serenitati
ad dies vitæ Concessis in Ditiones Suæ M[ajesta]tis, vel per Ditiones Suæ
M[ajesta]tis ad extera Regna educi solent, in sequentes Articulos una-
nimi voto consentiendo, tali modo conclusimus.
Quod de Bobos, vinis, alÿsque mercibus, per quoscunque ad proprios usus
necessitatesque Domesticas, intra ambitum Regni Hungariæ hinc inde
comparatis et devehendis, dum modo Vectores et Curatores
Eiuscemodi rerum, sufficientibus Literis testimonialibus comproba-
verint, Eiusmodi res, ad usus, necessitatesque domesticas Regnicolar[um]
Non autem extra Regnum quæstus gratia educi, utrinque a
prorsus Tricesima exigatur, juxta sancita publica Regni superin-
de statuta.
Item Sua Ser[enita]tis de Pecoribus, per quoslibet ex Transylvania alÿsque
ditionibus suis, quaestus gratia, per Hungariam extra Regnum

educendis, hoc est de Singulo bove uno juxta Statuta Regni, unum
florenum Hungaricalem cum dimidio. Sic etiam de alÿs mercibus, consue-
tam Tricesimam, in usuali et currenti moneta, per suos offcia-
les exegi faciet.
De Vinis, autem ex prædictis septem Comitatibus Suæ Ser[enita]ti concessis, et per
Ditiones Suæ Ma[jesta]tis sive immediate, sive successive, ex locis deposi-
tionum educendis, ut Sua Serenitas imposterum in locis Tricesima[rum]
Suæ M[ajesta]tis per quæ loca vini eductio in extera regni fieri consuevit,
peculiares Perceptores intertenere posit, qui à quolibet vase vini
per præfatas ditiones Suæ M[ajesta]tis, ex septem Comitatibus ad extera
Regna educendo, Duos florenos Hungaricales, itidem in usuali
atque currenti moneta, nomine Tricesimæ pro Sua Serenitate
percipiat, qui Perceptores, à D[omi]no Administratore Proventuum
Suæ Ma[jesta]tis], requirente necessitate promoveantur, et adiuventur.
Hoc ita conclusum, determinatum, et præsenti Scripto comprehensum
Authori[tate] n[ost]ra Plenipotentiali, à modo inposterum utrinque observan-
dum firmum ac ratum, nec non semper valiturum est.
Volentes proprÿs nostris sigillis et Chirographis robora-
Vimus, et authentice expedivimus. Datum in oppida
Tokaÿ die 19. Maÿ, Anno Millesimo Sexcentesimo Vigesimo Septimo.
Joannes Piber Elect[us]
Episcopus Agrien[sis] m[anu] p[ropria]
Stephanus ostrosith m[anu] p[ropria]
Geor[gius] Hoffman m[anu] p[ropria]
Sigismundus Lonÿai m[anu] p[ropria]
Joannes Bornemiza m[anu] p[ropria]
Stephanus Cassaÿ m[anu] p[ropria]
David Belavary m[anu] p[rorpia]
